opt_out_overview:
Yeah, I never read the instructions either.

In that case, I'm around anytime. Message me when you need weed!

Oh and I almost forgot, for more things I can help you with, type 'help'.

Say 'stop' to opt out of my messages (but know you'll hurt my robot feelings ðŸ’”).
